name: politico
text:
Pennsylvania, Michigan and Florida — states Trump barely won in 2016— have some of the highest numbers of unemployed workers in the U.S.

And they’ll see a reduction of more than $3 billion per week in income once the enhanced aid runs out, one report says
https://t.co/9K6Ilm8wqw

name: politico
text:
Joe Biden’s campaign today rolled out the policy recommendations reached by its joint task forces with supporters of Bernie Sanders ahead of the Democratic National Convention, which is slated for next month

https://t.co/aHAd5O3jAP
